algorithm.title: Algorithm
algorithm.description: Checksum algorithm, which is supported by the DPS. Checksum algorithm is used as value of premis:messageDigestAlgorithm element in technical metadata.

file_encoding.title: File encoding
file_encoding.description: Character encoding of file is included in premis:formatName element in technical metadata.

format_version.title: Format version
format_version.description: Format version is used as value for premis:formatVersion element in technical metadata.

file_created.title: File created
file_created.description: File creation date is used as value of premis:dateCreatedByApplication element in technical metadata. If value is not provided, the file creation date in packaging service is used.

file_format.title: File format
file_format.description: File format is used as value of premis:formatName element in technical metadata.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Identifier that defines from which storage service the file is copied.

parent_directory.title: Parent directory
parent_directory.description: Parent directory of file defines the category of file in logical structure map if use category is not defined for the file.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Identifier used for finding parent directory metadata
